original_text: They made a hole in the top of the robe, in the middle. They made an edge around the hole so that it would not tear. The priest's head would go through this hole.
korean_text: 그 옷의 두 어깨 사이에 구멍을 내고 갑옷 깃 같이 그 구멍 주위에 깃을 짜서 찢어지지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: They made a hole in the top of the robe
They made an edge around the hole
so that it would not tear
The priest's head would go through this hole
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장의 머리가 이 구멍으로 통과할 것이다
